verse: अथ यदि स्वसृलोककामो भवति संकल्पादेवास्य स्वसारः समुत्तिष्ठन्ति तेन स्वसृलोकेन संपन्नो महीयते॥

terms.संकल्पादेव (saṁkalpādeva): due to the resolve, by the intention

meaning: Meaning:Now, if one becomes desirous of attaining their own abode, by the intention alone, their inherent nature arises. Through that attainment of their own abode, they are glorified and become great.
